title: Bugsplat on the new patch, Help please!
body: Ever since updating to the new patch 7.10 i have been unable to load into game. The game always bugsplats after champ select, I have updating my drivers and checked the files for any corruption. I am unsure of how to fix this, any help would be much appreciated

replies.body: Those bugsplats can sometimes be a pretty good sign that some of the game files are damaged. I know you mentioned that you checked for corruption already, but let's double check by going through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974). Let me know if that's able to help, and if not we can dig a little further.

thank you for the reply, I did this and installed .net framework 2 weeks ago and it fixed the problem, but now i am having the same problem with the bugsplat. i have tried to do the same things that fixed it originality, but it does not seem to work, help would be appreciated. thank you!

Good job getting it fixed up on your own in the past! It might be related to the same thing this time around, but there's a good chance that it's just an entirely different problem. I want to make sure you get this fixed in the quickest/easiest way possible, so go ahead and shoot our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to look much more in-depth than I can here on the boards!

hello, so with the newest patch the first time i launched lol after updating the game worked fine, but the day after the same problem occurred and it bugsplats. i cant submit a support ticket because my account is not verified with the email it is attached to because i don't know what email it is on. is there any way i can change what email my account is connected to?
